column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This place is the mother of all ramen! I've never been a fan of ramen but was convinced to go during lunch with some coworkers that raved about this place. I'm so glad I did because the food is bomb! I always get the Jinya Chicken ramen and add the spice in myself. I'm sensitive to spicy foods but from what my husband and friends say
column2: they aren't kidding around with the spice. It will clear out your sinuses apparently. The chicken is lean which is hard to find in a ramen place. Everything I have had is good. My faves
